description:
Explore and navigate the world with confidence using Google Maps. Find the best routes with live traffic data and real-time GPS navigation for driving, walking, cycling and public transport. Discover over 250 million businesses and places – from restaurants and shops to everyday essentials – with photos, reviews and helpful information.

Navigate the world, the way that you want:
• Get to where you need to go with fuel-efficient route options
• Find the best route with real-time, turn-by-turn voice and on-screen navigation
• Save time with automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Catch the bus, train and ride-share effortlessly, with real-time updates
• Find bike or scooter rentals to get around more easily

Plan trips and experiences effortlessly:
• Preview an area before you go (e.g. parking, entrances) with Street View
• Use Immersive View to experience what landmarks, parks and routes look like, and even check the weather so that you can be ready in advance
• Create custom lists of your favourite saved places and share with others
• Order delivery and takeaway, make reservations and book hotels
• Don't get lost with offline maps in an area with bad signal
• Search for local places and things to do, and decide based on user reviews and photos

Discover and explore like a local:
• Explore with confidence knowing 500 million users contribute and keep the map up to date each year
• Avoid the crowds by seeing how busy a place is before you get there
• Use Lens in Maps to see walking directions overlaid on the real world
• Filter restaurants by cuisine, hours, price, rating and more
• Ask questions about a place, from dishes to parking, and get quick answers

Some features not available in all countries or cities
Navigation isn't intended to be used by oversized or emergency vehicles

Know what's ahead on the road with the help from other drivers. Waze is a live map that harnesses the local knowledge of tens of millions of drivers around the world. Drivers safely and confidently reach their everyday destinations thanks to Waze map’s GPS navigation, live traffic updates, real-time safety alerts (including roadworks, accidents, crashes, police, potholes and more) and accurate ETAs.


Make your next drive more predictable and stress-free:
• Get there faster with real-time directions, accurate ETAs and automatic rerouting based on live traffic, incidents and road closures
• Even if you know the way, avoid surprises on the road ahead with safety alerts for accidents, crashes, roadworks, objects on the road, potholes, speed bumps, sharp curves, bad weather, emergency vehicles, railway crossings and more
• Steer clear of tickets by knowing where police and red light and speed cameras are located
• Share what’s happening on the road with other drivers by reporting live incidents and hazards
• Stay informed of upcoming speed limit changes, and keep your speedometer in check
• Know which lane to be in with multi-lane guidance
• See toll pricing and choose to avoid tolls along your routes
• Add road passes and vignettes for HOV lanes and restricted traffic zones
• Find petrol/fuel stations and prices and EV charging stations along your route
• Locate car parks near your destination
• Use voice-guided turn-by-turn navigation from a variety of languages, local accents and your favourite celebrities
• Plan your next drive by checking ETAs by future departure or arrival times
• Use your favourite audio apps (for podcasts, music, news, audiobooks) directly within Waze
• Sync Waze to your car’s built-in display through Apple CarPlay


* Some features are not available in all countries


* Waze navigation is not intended for emergency or oversized vehicles


You can manage your in-app Waze privacy settings at any time. Learn more about the Waze privacy policy here, www.waze.com/legal/privacy.
Avec TaxiClub, vous pouvez commander un taxi n'importe où en France.

developer: DIRECT CURSUS COMPUTER SYSTEMS TRADING LLC
description:
Search for an address or the best places nearby both online and offline. Yandex Maps provides information about organizations and helps you reach your destination by car, public transport, bike, or on foot based on current traffic conditions.

Search for and select locations:
• The largest organization database and filters to refine your search.
• Detailed information: contacts, hours of operation, services provided, photos, and reviews.
• Floor plans to find your way around Moscow's major shopping malls.
• Search for places and addresses without an internet connection (offline maps).
• View places saved on your smartphone, tablet, and PC.

Custom map settings:
• Real-time location of buses, trams, trolleybuses, and minibuses.
• Road maps that show current traffic conditions in the city.
• Parking layer with the location and cost of official parking.
• Street panoramas for a road-side view of any address.
• Choose from three map types: Roadmap, Satellite, and Hybrid.

Public transport, car, bike, and walking routes:
• Pedestrian navigation: paths between buildings, through parks, across squares, and other pedestrian zones.
• Bike navigation: road types, underpass and overpass preferences, and highway warnings.
• Public transport routes with timetables and estimated time of arrival.
• Optimal driving routes based on live traffic conditions and driving options.
• Step-by-step instructions with voice navigation.
• Speed camera, speed limit, and speeding notifications.
• Real-time updates on traffic, road accidents, speed radar, and more.

Offline maps:
• Driving routes and voice navigation.
• Downloadable lightweight maps (minimum storage space, for example, the Moscow map is just 187 MB).
• Database of organizations with hours of operation, services provided, and more.
• Over 2000 cities in Russia, Armenia, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Latvia, Turkey, Ukraine, and Estonia.

Information from users:
• Mark road events on the map and comment on user submissions.
• Regular updates to the Public Map keep you informed about your city.
• Write reviews, upload photos, and update information about organizations.

Yandex Maps has an Apple Watch app. Use it to:
• Navigate the map.
• View the nearest metro station and public transport stops.
• Find out when public transport will arrive at a nearby stop.
• Track traffic patterns a few hours ahead of time.
• View weather forecasts.

Terms of Use: apple.com/legal/itunes/appstore/dev/stdeula
Privacy Policy: yandex.com/legal/confidential

Moovit is one app for all your urban mobility and transport rides!

Dailymail - "This travel app is a godsend for anyone using public transport – with live updates to bus schedules, as well as a great route-planner for cities across the UK."

Transportation is an integral part of urban living. Whether you ride the train, subway/underground /tube, bus, light rail, ferry or metro, use bikes, ride-sharing like Uber, getting the best urban mobility information is critical. Moovit guides you from point A to B in the easiest and most efficient way. Get train and bus times, maps, and live arrival times with ease so you can plan your trip with confidence. Find critical alerts and service disruptions for your favorite lines. Get step-by-step directions of optimal route bus, train, metro, bike or a combination of them. 
This is why Moovit has been named one of the best apps of the year 2017 by the App Store!

Moovit guides more than 865 million users in over 3200 cities throughout the world.

► Journey Planner that combines you all transport options and gives you the best route with live arrivals.

► Live Directions: Get step-by-step directions with live guidance as you travel: know exactly how long you need to walk to your station, how long you’re waiting, view the arrival time of your line and how many stops are left. 

► Real time arrivals. View real-time arrival updates, which are taken directly from GPS devices positioned on buses and trains.

► Real time alerts. Know about issues ahead of time by receiving service alerts such as emergency or unexpected disruptions, delays, traffic jams, new construction and more...

► Users reports. Moovit’s users report issues found with stations, line service, and timetables so that we can inform all nearby riders about what’s going on in their area.

► Favorite lines, stations, and places. Get easy access to lines, stations, and places you ride and visit all the time. Plus, get real-time updates if/when there are changes to your favorite lines in case your bus or train time is impacted!

► Bike routes. Get bike routes in addition to the bus, subway, train, or metro trip plans. If you ride bikes (yours or shared) we can plan a route that includes the train or bus. 
Bike docking stations are updated in real-time.

► Maps view. View all stations, routes, and lines on the subway or bus map. Additionally, maps are available in PDF for when you’re offline, or underground on the subway. 

Ride with Moovit in all major cities:

UK:
• London
• Manchester
• Birmingham
• Leeds
• Edinburgh
• Glasgow
• Liverpool
• Sheffield

Ireland:
• Dublin and all of the Republic of Ireland. 

Moovit supports all major transit:

UK:
• TFL - Bus, Tube, DLR, Overground, Ferry (River Bus), Tfl Rail, Tram, Coach
• National Express
• National Rail
• Arriva
• First
• Stagecoach and more...

Ireland:
• Bus Eireann
• Dublin Bus
• Irish Rail
• Luas
• Kenneally’s Bus Service and more…

Bike sharing provided by:
• Santander Cycles in London
• BelfastBikes in Belfast
• Bike in Bath
• Nextbike in Glasgow

India:
•Delhi: Delhi Metro (DMRC), Delhi Buses (DTC), Northern Railways (NR)
•Mumbai: Mumbai Metro (M.M.R.D.A), all buses: BEST, NMMT, KDMT, VVMT, MBMT, KMT, TMT, Ferries and more
•Bangalore: Namma Metro, B.M.T.C (buses and metro feeder routes), South Western Railways
•Chennai: Chennai Metro Rail, all buses - Metropolitan Transport Corporation (MTA)
•Ahmedabad: A.M.T.S, Bus Rapid Transport System (BRTS), V.T.C.O.S 
•Pune: Indian Railways, Pune Local Central Railways, Pune Mahanagar Parivahan Mahaman.

Singapore:
• MRT, LRT, bus, tram, cable car & shuttle buses. Service provided by:
• SBS
• SMRT
• Tower Transit
• Go-Ahead Singapore

You ride, we guide!

Feel free to contact us:

https://moovitapp.zendesk.com/hc/requests/new
moovit@Facebook, Twitter

Terms of Use
https://moovitapp.com/en-us/legal/terms-of-service-en

Put safety first with Famio.

Designed for your peace of mind, Famio keeps track of your loved ones so that you don't have to. Thanks to Famio, you will always know where they are and whether they need any help. 

What can you do with Famio?

- Locate your family members, kids, friends, and loved ones in real-time, at any time.
- See your loved ones' location history to make sure everyone is staying safe.
- Receive notifications when they arrive or leave home, work, or school.
- Create separate groups for family and friends.
- Get a heads up when someone's phone is low on battery, which can affect your communication.

Take your safety to the next level and focus on your day, knowing that everyone is doing well. Famio will keep you updated 24/7. 

Famio offers a variety of features that go beyond location tracking: 

- Emergency Alerts: Send an SOS message and your precise location to friends, family, and responders in one click.
- Map Reactions: Stay connected with quick reactions and emojis. 
- Private Chat: Share quick updates without leaving the app.
- Driving Mode: Build better driving habits and make sure your loved ones drive safely.
- Child Mode: Make Famio super easy and helpful for the little ones. 
- Data Breach Alert: Famio will ensure your internet safety and data protection. 

Are you always worrying about your loved ones' safety and waiting for their texts? Famio will ease your anxiety and help you stay on top of things. 

An extra safety measure never hurts. Download Famio now and stay in the loop 24/7!

Disclaimer
Please note that real-time location tracking relies on obtaining permission from another user to access their geodata.

The app offers the following subscription options:
- Weekly at $7.99 with a 3-day free trial; $29.99 per 12 weeks.
- Payment will be charged to your iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase.
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours prior to the end of the current subscription period.
- The account is charged for renewal within 24-hours before the end of the current subscription period.
- Subscriptions can be managed by the user and auto-renewal can be turned in the user’s Account Settings after purchase.
- The cost of renewal is equal to the value that “Apple’s App Store Matrix” determines as the equivalent of the subscription price in $USD.
- Any unused portion of a free trial period, if offered, will be forfeited when the user purchases a subscription to that publication.

Privacy Policy: https://myfamio.com/privacy-policy
Terms of Service: https://myfamio.com/terms-of-use

Speedometer Simple is a simple speedometer that is very easy to use. 

This app uses phone's GPS to accurately determine your speed.

Speedometer has large fonts and supports mph, km/h, and knots speed display. Optionally, city name and a compass can be shows on the screen. The app also shows the traveled distance. Average and maximum speed is displayed in an optional screen as well. Interface color can be set one of many pre-selected colors. Speedometer app can record the speed during your trips and provide post-trip statistics like maximum speed, traveled distance etc.

IOPGPS (Internet of position) provides vehicle and cargo tracking managment total solution for your business.  IOPGPS enables remote fleet management and cost control easily with lots of powerful features, including real-time tracking, history playback, alarm recording, business dashboard, etc. With its user-friendly interface and advanced capabilities, IOPGPS is the first choice for your business seeking a comprehensive, reliable vehicle tracking management platform.

Glympse makes it easy to temporarily share your live location with friends, family, coworkers, or clients — no sign-up required. Whether you're meeting friends, organizing a large event, coordinating a delivery, or managing mobile teams, Glympse gives you a fast, secure way to answer the question: “Where are you?”

Just send a Glympse link and let others see your real-time location on a map — from any device, no app needed. You control who sees you and for how long. Location sharing expires automatically. Glympse works seamlessly across popular mobile devices, so everyone stays connected.

This is real-time location sharing, done right. This is how you Share Your Where®.

Why Glympse?
No sign-ups required for end recipients
Cross-platform: works on any device or browser
Auto-expiring location sharing for privacy and peace of mind
Free to use, with optional Premium features for events and businesses

Everyday Uses
Let friends know when you’re on the way
Coordinate family meetups or school pickups
Track kids, carpools, or teams temporarily
Keep your customers informed with live ETAs
Replace vague texts with real-time clarity
Power event tracking with branded maps

Premium Features — Boost Your Brand, Power Your Events
Glympse Premium Shares
Perfect for businesses that want to look professional while improving operations. Premium Shares reduces call volume, increases transparency, and makes your brand stand out during every customer interaction. Add your logo, colors, links, and messaging to every location share. Ideal for:
Home services & HVAC
Limo & rideshare fleets
Couriers & mobile service teams
Appointment-based businesses


Glympse Premium Tags
Create a branded, trackable map for your next public event or mobile operation. Premium Tags help the public follow your journey in real time, all wrapped in your own look and feel. Customize it with your logo, route stops, and a memorable tag name (e.g. !SantaParade2025). Ideal for:
Food trucks & pop-up businesses
Parades & community events
Marathons & races
Traveling shows or rallies

Secure Group Sharing
Private Groups: Create invite-only Groups to share real-time locations among trusted members. It’s great for families, travel groups, and sports teams.
Glympse Favorites
Quickly share your location with the people you connect with most. Save your go-to contacts,like family, close friends, or coworkers, as Favorites for faster sharing with just a tap. No need to scroll or search every time. 

Built for Privacy
We pioneered safe, temporary location sharing in 2008 — and we’ve stayed true to our values. Your data is never sold. Viewer links don’t require logins. Sharing is short-term by design.

Map display for non-app users may be imprecise in Japan, China, and South Korea due to regional mapping limitations. In-app users are not affected.

Download Glympse for free today and experience the smart, safe way to Share Your Where®.
Terms of Use: https://corp.glympse.com/terms/

Cellular Tower & Signal Finder is the ultimate solution to track and locate nearby cell towers on an interactive map. Whether you're looking to boost your mobile signal or simply curious about network coverage in your area, this app provides accurate details of 5G, 4G, 3G, and 2G towers.

Key Features:

Real-Time Tower Locations: View nearby cell towers for all major network types, including 5G, 4G, 3G, and 2G.
Detailed Tower Information: Access detailed information like tower ID, signal strength, area, and network provider.
Map Integration: Seamlessly locate towers on a live map with an intuitive interface.

Explore network coverage on map with Cellular Tower & Signal Finder today!

Note- Premium Subscription is required to use advanced features such as tower details and filter.

Privacy: https://celltower.bravycode.com/privacy.html
Terms: https://celltower.bravycode.com/terms.html

With many locations and points of interest, Neshan Map serves as a reliable platform for finding places. 

Neshan also offers navigation features, including Apple CarPlay support, and Multi-mode navigation. Whether you're driving, riding a motorcycle, or using public transportation, Neshan helps you find the fastest and the smoothest routes to your destination.

Neshan’s routing capabilities provide a unique experience designed for online taxi drivers. With GPS-based navigation, Neshan suggests the best route and notifies users in case of GPS spoofing.

Neshan is free to download and use.

Key Features of Neshan Map:
Worldwide maps based on OpenStreetMap (OSM) data
Quick & easy search for public places like restaurants, gas stations, ATMs, etc.
Save personal locations
Verified business accounts
Apple CarPlay support
Multi-mode navigation (Car, Metro & Bus, Motorcycle, Bicycle, Walking)
Accurate location detection via GPS
Optimized battery consumption
Know which lane to be in with multi-lane guidance

With Neshan, you'll never get lost!

developer: GOLDLAB APPLICATIONS YAZILIM VE BILISIM ANONIM SIRKETI
description:
Navigation-Radar: Safe and Easy Travel with Advanced Maps

With Navigation-Radar, every journey becomes less stressful and more rewarding. Instead of worrying about wrong turns or poor signals, you enjoy confidence, safety, and freedom. The combination of map, navigation, and gps tools gives you control of your travel experience so you can focus on what matters most—getting there comfortably and on time.

Travel Smarter, Save Time

Avoid fines and stressful surprises with real-time alerts. The gps tracker, tracking devices, and hud display keep you informed of speed limits, radar zones, and hazards. This means fewer distractions, safer driving, and peace of mind on every route.

Stay Connected Anywhere

Don’t let a weak signal stop your adventure. With offline map support, you always have access to your planned route. Combined with organic map design, your navigation feels natural and reliable. The gps map camera helps you capture and review your journeys so you can always retrace your steps.

Maximize Every Journey

Find fuel, food, or hotels instantly with smart search. Save your favorite places, bookmark routes, and review your travel history through the gps tracker. Supported by tracking devices, hud integration, and layered organic map views, you travel with confidence knowing everything you need is at your fingertips.

Your Benefit

Navigation-Radar isn’t just about maps—it’s about giving you more freedom, safety, and efficiency. You save time, reduce stress, and enjoy complete control of your travels. With tools like the gps map camera, detailed maps, and precise navigation, your journeys become easier, smoother, and more enjoyable.

Download Navigation-Radar today and take control of your travel. Get there faster, safer, and smarter.

Your subscription automatically renews, ensuring you never miss a moment of enhanced app usage. However, you have the flexibility to manage your subscription settings and turn off auto-renewal at any time from your account preferences.

Privacy Policy: https://www.goldlabtechnology.com/privacy-policy.html
Terms of Use: https://www.goldlabtechnology.com/end-user-license-agreement/

Traffie Navigation provide exceptional navigation experience. 
Traffie tells you instantly about traffic, construction, accidents, crashes, & more. 
Avoid traffic delays with real-time traffic information about situation on the road. Receive traffic alerts when you're driving. 
Whether on holiday, taking a weekend trip or heading off somewhere as yet unfamiliar – with Traffie, you can be sure of getting there quickly and safely! 
Traffie automatically shows alternate routes to a parking spots near your destination.
Traffie make it easier to navigate when it’s dark outside, potentially reducing the risk associated with using the app while behind the wheel.
Head-up Display projects navigation onto the windshield of your car, making driving at night safer.
Speed limit of the next section, allowing you adjust your speed through the section accordingly. App tells you when (distance) the speed limit is going to change.

With Siri Shortcuts in Traffie, you can record shortcuts for your drive home and drive to work, all of which can be activated with a simple Siri voice command.

Weather Road Conditions with Road Risk Score: 
Weather Forecast Along Your Route shows the weather forecast at the expected time at each point of your route or road trip. 
Road Risk Score alerts you to the specific level of risk at all points along your route in advance.
Find the safest time to leave based on weather!

• The speed limit feature will show the maximum speed for the road 
• Speed limit of the next section
• Head-up Display projects navigation onto the windshield of your car, making driving at night safer
• Ability to report incidents to help other drivers 
• Turn-by-turn directions
• Advanced Night map mode
• Reported alerts including accidents, hazards, road closures, and more
• Warning sounds alerts to warn you of potential traffic problems near your location
• Share Traffic Alert location
• Look Around support: Explore landmarks in stunning detail with Apple’s interactive Look Around feature.
• Weather Forecast Map
• Places Near your location
• Auto Refresh Traffic Data
• Siri Shortcuts
• Apple CarPlay Connectivity - all navigation features on your car’s built-in display
• Auto-zoom map according to your speed
• Suggested Route: Learns your daily patterns and predicts where you’re heading next
• Weather along route with road risk score

Information about the auto-renewable nature of the subscription
- Every time in a month you can reach Traffie locations and if you want to continue getting Traffie locations, your subscription should be continued.
- The subscription period is 1 week. Every 1 week your subscription renews.
- The price of the subscription is $1.99 Traffie Basic, $3.99 Traffie Premium,
- Payment will be charged to iTunes Account at confirmation of purchase
- Subscription automatically renews unless auto-renew is turned off at least 24-hours before the end of the current period
- You can cancel your subscription via this url: https://support.apple.com/en-us/HT202039
- Privacy policy: https://bit.ly/32SgUdZ
- Term of use: https://bit.ly/32XVuMx

Get your current GPS coordinates even faster!

   • Pinpoint Precision with High Accuracy GPS: Discover your exact coordinates, altitude, GPS precision, and satellite count, ensuring you're always on the m
   • Flexible Coordinate Formats: Tailor your experience with multiple latitude and longitude formats (DD decimal degrees, DDM degrees and decimal minutes, DMS degrees, minutes and seconds sexagesimal , UTM Universal Transverse Mercator, MGRS Military Grid Reference System) to suit your needs.
   • Snapshot Memories: Capture the moment and location with a photo, complete with all GPS details artistically displayed.
   • Personalize Your Memories: Customize your Geo-tagged photos by adjusting the position, color, and size of the location data overlay.
   • Bookmark Your Adventures: Save any location with the option to attach a photo, perfect for revisiting those special spots.
   • Distance Units of Your Choice: Whether you prefer metric or imperial, choose the unit that makes sense for you.
   • Unmatched Location Accuracy: Rely on the app’s superior accuracy to pinpoint your exact position.
   • Map View of Saved Locations: Visualize all your saved spots on a user-friendly map interface.
   • Effortless Location Search: Easily find locations by address – simplicity at its best.
   • Instant Location Sharing: Share your current whereabouts quickly and effortlessly.
   • Organized Memories: Filter your saved locations by date, distance, or keywords for easy access.
   • In-App Learning Hub: Get to know the app better with the helpful in-app guidance function.
   • Compass Navigation to Saved Spots: Let the built-in compass guide you back to your saved locations.
   • Versatile Data Export and Import: Use GPX, KML, or the custom MYGPS format for comprehensive data management, including photos.
   • Lifesaving SOS Feature: Send an SOS message with your coordinates in emergencies, customizable with a preset number and message.
   • Customizable Sorting Options: Sort your saved locations by name, date, or proximity to your current position.
   • Adjustable Location Accuracy Mode: Choose your desired balance between precision and battery consumption.
   • Seamless Watch Integration: Save locations using your Apple Watch and sync seamlessly with your phone.
   • Diverse Map Choices: Switch between normal, terrain, hybrid, and satellite maps for diverse viewing options.

Our app comes with a application for Apple Watch devices. You can easily save your current location without using your phone and synchronize data afterwards to enjoy viewing your saved locations on a bigger screen!

Internet connection is not needed but it's helpful to get better accuracy.
Get your current GPS coordinates even faster!

Data is based on WGS84.

Disclaimer:
Accuracy depends on the quality of GPS hardware in your device as well as outside weather conditions. Be aware that GPS does not work well indoors, so try to use it outside most of the time. It is extremely important because trying to get coordinates at home might be difficult.Get your current GPS coordinates even faster!

Privacy policy: https://mysticmobileapps.com/legal/privacy/mygpscoordinates
Terms and conditions: https://mysticmobileapps.com/legal/terms/mygpscoordinates
L’application MT Ticket vous accompagne dans vos déplacements sur les lignes urbaines du réseau Centre et prochainement du réseau Nord.

With the "Police Detector - speed camera" application, you can mark the location of speed cameras and police radars on the map, as well as see their location marked by other users of the application. You can also mark road events like road accidents, road repairs, weight control and ask for help from other users of the application if you have a problem on the road.

The main advantages of the application "Police Detector - speed camera":
* Absolutely free
* No registration needed
* Displays high-speed cameras and police patrols (if they are marked by other users)
* Displays traffic jams
* Works in Radar Detector mode
* Shows speed limits on road sections near high-speed cameras and police patrols (if speed limits are introduced by users)

Enjoy driving with the best navigator, speed camera detector and real-time traffic information. Forget about fines and drive with peace of mind.

MAIN FEATURES
- 100% legal speed camera detector
- Turn by turn GPS navigation, with lane guidance, spoken instructions, speed limits, and the speed camera detector fully integrated into the navigation
- Automatic route recorder. Shows the total distance and time spent traveling the route, speed at each point and speed cameras you passed. Check the speed you were having when passing speed cameras or anywhere
- Route planner. Create routes in advance to check their speed limits and the speed cameras you will find in them
- Real-time traffic information
- No user account or registration, just open the app and that's it


THE BEST SPEED CAMERA DETECTOR:
- CarPlay
- Warnings only in the direction you are moving
- Mean speed in section speed cameras
- Options to silence the warnings if your speed is OK
- Manual or automatic (depending on your speed) warning distance 
- Automatic speed camera updates
- Voice, sound and vibration warnings, also in your Apple Watch
- Map with real time traffic or view with no map, only with the speedometer
- Sound mixed with what you're listening to on your iPhone, through your car's hands-free kit or iPhone speakers
- Works in the foreground or background (use it alongside other apps)
- Fully configurable, portrait and landscape mode, night mode
- Coverage in most countries, download the app and check the coverage in your area in the map


NAVIGATION:
- Turn by turn navigation integrated with speed camera warnings and traffic map. All in the same screen, no need to use several apps
- Warnings of only the speed cameras with are in your route (configurable). Avoid false positives from nearby roads
- Speed limits when navigating
- Indications of the lanes to follow when changing direction
- Spoken instructions together with speed camera warnings


ROUTES
- Automatic route recorder. Shows the total distance and time spent on the route, speed at each point and speed cameras you passed. Check the speed you were going when passing speed cameras or at any location
- You can configure for how many days the routes will be saved and the minimum distance and duration to save them or disable this function. This data is saved on your device and is not sent anywhere
- Route planner. Create routes in advance to see their speed limits and the speed cameras you will encounter taking into account the direction in which you will pass them
- Launch navigation from a recording or a planned route. The best option at that time will be calculated taking into account the intermediate stops on the route


- TRAFFIC MAP:
- Map with traffic information
- As soon as you open the app, the map is centered in your location and traffic information is shown
- You can keep the map centered in a different location from your current one to watch the traffic in a specific area


APP FOR APPLE WATCH:
- If you open the app on your Watch, it will vibrate with each alert, it works in foreground and background
- Navigation instructions, including lanes to follow
- Launch the detector from the Watch keeping your iPhone in your pocket


IMPORTANT:
- The speed camera detector and navigation use the GPS continuously. Using it in the foreground or background can drain the battery quickly.
- To use the speed camera detector and navigation you need a GPS device: all iPhones have it. iPads with 3G have it but not WiFi ones.
- SCDB provides the speed camera data base.


Terms and Conditions: http://www.littlemousesoftware.com/terms-conditions
Privacy Policy: http://www.littlemousesoftware.com/radar-all-privacy

Spyglass is an essential offline GPS app for outdoors and off-road navigation. Packed with tools it serves as binoculars, heads-up display, hi-tech compass with offline maps, gyrocompass, GPS receiver, waypoint tracker, speedometer, altimeter, Sun, Moon and star finder, gyro horizon, rangefinder, coordinate converter, sextant, inclinometer, angular calculator and camera. It saves your custom places and waypoints, navigates precisely to them later, shows them on maps and using real-time augmented reality displays detailed GPS info, measures distances, sizes, angles, and does a lot more.

COMPASS & GYROCOMPASS

Accuracy improvement techniques, special compass modes and calibration methods available in Spyglass only make it a real instrument – the most advanced and accurate digital compass.

FINDER, TRACKER & AR NAVIGATION

Spyglass operates in 3D and uses augmented reality to show real-time object positions, info and directions to them overlaid over camera or maps.

Save current position, add points from maps, manually enter location coordinates and bearings, add stars by hand or use a built-in star catalogue.

Find saved places and objects later simply by following directional arrows.

Spyglass tracks multiple targets simultaneously and shows their info – distance, direction, azimuth, elevation and estimated time of arrival.

Copy, paste and share locations, coordinates and map links using many supported formats.

GPS, SPEEDOMETER & ALTIMETER

Find and track your location and get detailed real-time GPS data – coordinates in dozens of formats, altitude, course, current, maximum and vertical speed, using imperial, metric, nautical and surveying units.

OFFLINE MAPS

See your and targets’ positions on maps using different map styles and alternative map providers – plan waypoints and measure distances. Offline maps optimized for retina displays are available for download.

TRACK STARS, SUN AND MOON & NAVIGATE BY STARS

Track positions of stars, Sun and Moon with arc second precision – use them as a reference to calibrate compass for maximum accuracy.

OPTICAL RANGEFINDER

Measure distances to objects in real time with a rangefinder reticle similar to sniper sights.

SEXTANT, ANGULAR CALCULATOR AND INCLINOMETER

Find out heights of objects and distances to them – measure visually and calculate dimensions and distances. 

CAMERA

Take pictures overlaid with all available GPS, positional and directional data.

DEMO & HELP

Videos:
http://j.mp/spyglass_vids

Manuals:
http://j.mp/spyglass_help

If you need specific map sources for hiking, cycling, skiing and many more outdoor activities, feel free to enjoy Spyglass PLUS.

Imagine walking around your favourite neighbourhood and you wonder if there is a place for rent nearby. Well, there's an App for that. The RentCompass App combines everything we love about iPhone maps and location services to deliver an unparalleled experience.
 
Find rental apartments and houses on the go while commuting to work or school, or while sitting in your favorite coffee shop.
Like a property you see? Browse the property photos in full screen, contact the listing agent/landlord instantly via email or phone. Don't have a data plan? Simply mark the property as a favourite and it will be downloaded on the device for off-line browsing.
Best the first to find out about new listings. Receive suggested remote notifications similar to properties you have contacted. Contact any landlord to activate remote notifications.

The App is free for renters and listing is free for individual landlords. you can list your property using RentCompass App on your iPhone or iPad.  We are proud to be Canada's first rental listing service for the iPhone, iPad and iPod touch. 

Instantly create an account and list your rental property using your iPhone or iPad.

developer: DIRECT CURSUS COMPUTER SYSTEMS TRADING LLC
description:
Yandex Navigator is the perfect companion for drivers.
It helps you find your way around the city with fast, convenient directions that avoid traffic jams and road closures. If road conditions change, Yandex Navigator adjusts your route on the fly.

No surprises on the road
Get detailed directions as you drive and find out about road conditions ahead of time. The app warns you about traffic, speed limits, cameras, and road closures. 
It also lets you know when there’s an upcoming turn or complex intersection. And since it does that using voice notifications, you can keep your eyes on the road.

Get multi-stop directions
There’s no need to waste time planning the most efficient routes if you need to make multiple stops along the way. Let Yandex Navigator do the work for you.
Plan a route with 4-10 stops and tap "Optimize." Yandex Navigator will reorder them to make the route as quick and convenient as possible.

Get your bearings anywhere 
No matter where you are, Yandex Navigator shows you how to get to where you need to go. Search for restaurants, cafes, bars, shops, gas stations, pharmacies, stadiums, law firms, or anything else, navigating there quickly and stress-free.

Never get lost offline
Find places and plan routes even without a connection once you’ve downloaded offline maps for your city or region.

Pay for parking 
Look for convenient parking spots near your destination. And since you can pay for them right from Yandex Navigator, you don’t need other apps.

Pay for fuel
Choose your fuel type, select how much you need, and pay for it without leaving the app. Just tap the fuel tank button, and you'll see all nearby gas stations along with their available payment options.

Steer clear of poor road conditions
Turn on "Avoid bad and unpaved roads" in the route parameters or app settings. Yandex Navigator will guide you along smooth, paved roads wherever possible.

Plan your trips ahead of time
Adjust departure date and time settings to see how long your route is in advance.
For example, you can plan how to get to the airport the evening before your flight by setting the departure date for the next day. Yandex Navigator shows how long it usually takes to drive that route at that time, taking into account the usual traffic conditions. You'll definitely get there on schedule.

Get directions tailored to your vehicle
If you're driving a truck or other freight vehicle, select "Add truck" in the app settings and describe your vehicle's characteristics. Yandex Navigator will get directions that account for any weight, size, or emission limitations.

Monitor traffic in real time
Yandex Navigator updates your route details when traffic conditions change. You can also add widgets to your phone’s home screen that show traffic levels for your favorite routes so you can keep track of them even without  opening the app.

See your route laid out in front of you 
Yandex Navigator is available for CarPlay, making it easy to follow your route on the screen in front of you without getting distracted by your phone. To make that work, you'll need a Yandex Plus subscription.

The app works in Russia, Abkhazia, Azerbaijan, Armenia, Belarus, Georgia, Kazakhstan, Kyrgyzstan, Moldova, Tajikistan, Turkey, Uzbekistan.

GPS & Maps Navigator is your ultimate GPS assistant designed for fast, accurate, and smart travel. Whether you're commuting daily, planning a road trip, or exploring new places, Route master brings all your travel tools together in one place.

Key Features:

 Smart Route Planner: Enter your source and destination to get the most optimized routes instantly with advanced maps navigation support.

 Nearby Places: Discover restaurants, gas stations, ATMs, and more around you using smart maps navigator tools.

 Current Location Finder: Quickly find  your current position using precise GPS location.

 Currency Converter: Convert global currencies while using the app during your trips.

 Language Translator: Communicate with ease while traveling, no matter the language.

 Wi-Fi Tools: Find nearby Wi-Fi hotspots and manage saved passwords using the built-in network tools and location services.

Ideal for travelers, delivery drivers, road trippers, or anyone needing a reliable GPS-based app or intuitive maps navigator. Route Master gives you smooth navigation, real-time tracking, and helpful tools to make every journey easier.

 Download GPS & Maps Navigator now and make your next trip smarter with GPS and maps navigation!

Moscow Metro

Digital assistant in the world of urban transport

Metro map. Choose routes taking into account changes in the work of the metro, MCC, MCC and BCL – the application will tell you the time of arrival of the train and a convenient car for the transfer. Do you want to know the train schedule of the MCC and MCC? View the schedule by clicking on the desired station. Do you need the shortest and fastest route or with a minimum of transfers? The application will do everything for you – just specify your preferences in the settings, the algorithm will select the best option. If you are looking for a place to park, withdraw cash or grab a coffee on the way, then apply filters - the desired points will be displayed on the map.

Replenishment of the balance. Top up your card at any time, and the tips in the app will help you choose a convenient way to record: in a ticket vending machine, a yellow terminal in the subway or on a validator in ground transport.

Personal account. A huge number of services are collected here: card binding, payment by biometrics, Multitransport subscription, purchase of tickets for intercity buses. And what else is there – see in the app!

Transfer of balance. Now it's not a big deal to lose the linked "Troika" – just transfer the balance to a new card, having previously linked it to the cabinet.

Payment by biometrics. The plastic world has won, and we have created a service for contactless fare payment – you no longer need to carry extra cards with you. Take a selfie, link a bank or social card and pass through the turnstile by looking into the camera lens.

History. Have you forgotten what purchases you made? Open the history, find the operation you need and download the receipt.

Multitransport. From home to any point – in one click! We have combined the most popular destinations – now in one application you can buy "One", order "Yandex.Taxi" or choose Yandex. Subscriptions.Scooters" and "Bike.

Intercity buses. We are not limited to Moscow – for long-distance travel, use the Intercity Buses service: add passengers and buy a ticket. The digital ticket will be available in your orders immediately after purchase, and if you suddenly change your mind, you can also return the ticket here.

News. It contains the most up-to-date information about all changes in the work of the metro.

Request for support. Need help on the way? Create an application for escort, specifying the meeting place and destination, and our employees of the Passenger Mobility Center (TSOMP) will do the rest.

A request for a lost/found item. If you have lost your belongings or found someone else's – make a request in the application, our staff will contact you. No more phone calls and waiting on the line.

The most powerful and versatile tool for viewing and editing custom maps, surveying, editing or managing mass of your geography data.

● You can use Map Plus as a professional GIS tool for geographic data gathering, editing, measuring, cartography, surveying, planning, online/offline viewing and many other management.
● You can also use Map Plus to help your outdoor activities and global travels, for trip planning, offline map downloading, track/photo/video recording, and sharing memories with friends. 

Besides common map features such as locating, searching, Map Plus provides many more special:

● Configuring, viewing and downloading any online maps of  XYZ/WMS/WMTS patterns, or using scripts to configure more complex ones.
● Handling GIS vector file formats, such as Shape(SHP), TAB, GEOJSON, GML/GZ, AutoCAD DXF...
● Handling Common GIS file formats such as  KML, KMZ, GPX, CSV, WPT.. Supported styles in KML/KMZ.
● Handling offline map file formats such as MBTiles, RMaps...
● On-map vector editing with finger drag-drop and magnetic snap.
● GPS Track Recording with auto-recovery and background mode support.
● Path Following with voice guidance for both user paths and searched direction routes.
● Displaying locations of photos and videos in your system photo albums. (no need to import)
● User data management with folders, sub-folders, layers, bulk operations, shortcuts, tags and fuzzy searches. Supports Advanced Search by using expressions with attribute conditions.
● Using Feature Class for bulk editing and managing similar (same class of) features and layers all together. Supports bulk Attributes Merge and Link Relationship Building between features of different classes.
● Conditional Style and Expression provide dynamic content rendering.
● Customizable pop-up panel for on-map picking items with HTML, JS and CSS support to make custom forms, layout and rich-formatted content.
● Handling coordinates in MGRS, UTM, and Plus Code.
● Photo Markup allows you draw markups on photo, such as arrows, texts, free-hand drawings.
● Browser Access allows you to access app's data or files from a desktop PC/Mac with a web browser wirelessly.
● Sharing or transferring data via Wi-Fi, Bluetooth, iCloud, SMS, Email, QR codes, Open-In, AirDrop or many other ways.
● Many more fantastic and free functions could not be fully descriped here, such as Guide Mark, Arrival Notification, Photo Mode, Map Level Adjust, Custom Icons, Photo/Video Attachments, Image Overlay, Text Overlay, Fast Editing, Distance/Perimeter/Area Measuring, Custom Time Zone, etc.

Family Locator lets you stay connected with your family members during the day. Family Locator ensures family safety, even when they're far away!

With Family Locator you can also:

KIDS & TEENS location tracker - extremely helpful app for parents
 
Real-time location tracker is an ideal solution for parents who worry too much. Use Spoten and be sure your kids are safe. Sometimes your kids can’t answer the phone for one reason or another. Spoten helps you to know where they are.
Knowing that your child is at school helps you save some nerves.  
 
Track YOUNG DRIVERS
 
Make sure your young drivers get to school safely without constantly texting them every few hours. It's a huge piece of mind. In other words, location tracker will make your overprotective heart happy while still giving your teens independence.
No more worrying!
 
Track your FAMILY around the world
 
Now you can manage the whole family easily, know where your mom or dad is and where to find them. No need to send text messages asking “When will you be home?” The Spoten tells you!
 
CELLPHONE

Note: Spoten must be installed on the phone that you want to track.

PLACES
 
Add places and get notified when your family members arrive and leave.
 
Emergency SOS function 
You can send a signal to your relatives if you need emergency help. The emergency SOS function allows you to alert all family members that you need help.
 
How does it work?
- add your relative's phone number to the app;
- click the SOS button if you need emergency help;
- your relative will receive a signal for help and see a live update of your geolocation.
 
Features
